data.title: Carey Van Dyke: All About Barry Van Dyke’s Oldest Son
data.meta_description: Carey Van Dyke is well-known for more than just his acting work because he is both the grandson and son of the famous actors Barry Van Dyke and Dick Van Dyke.
data.text:
Carey Van Dyke is a famous American writer and actor best known for Chernobyl Diaries, The Silence, and Don’t Worry, Darling (2022). (2012). Carey is well-known for more than just his acting work because he is both the grandson and son of the famous Diagnosis: Murder actors Barry Van Dyke and Dick Van Dyke.

The following article will discuss Carey Van Dyke Early Life, Family, Career, Wife, Kids, and Net Worth.

Carey Van Dyke Early Life

Carey Van Dyke was birthed on February 25, 1976, in Oak Park, California, to parents Barry and Mary Carey. As of 2023, he will be 46 years old. Carey Wayne Van Dyke is his real name.

Similarly, he spent a large portion of his early years in his hometown. Regarding education, he’s thought to have gone to Moorpark College with his brothers. In addition, he is American by nationality and of mixed heritage.

Carey’s Family Background

The first member of Carey’s family to enter the acting industry and achieve fame was his grandfather Dick Van Dyke. His father, Barry, and siblings Christian, Stacy, and Carrie Beth Van Dyke continued their grandfather’s tradition by working in the motion picture industry.

He is also the great-nephew of American comedian and actor Jerry Van Dyke. Carey is also first cousins with Kelly Jean Van Dyke, an adult performer, and actor.

Carey Van Dyke Has Three Siblings

Carey is his parents’ first child. His 2 younger brothers, Shane, and Wes Van Dyke, came after him. He also has an elder sister, Taryn Van Dyke, his youngest sibling.

Like him, all of Carey’s siblings attempted their luck in the movie business, albeit Shane was more successful than the others. American actor, screenwriter, and producer Shane is his brother and is 43 years old. Similarly to his older brother, Wes, who is 38, and his sister Taryn, 36, both have acting experience.

The siblings have collaborated on some projects. However, Carey and his well-known brother Shayne Van Dyke have recently worked together as professionals. Don’t Worry Darling, a movie they co-wrote, was just released. Here, we briefly discuss the film.

Carey Van Dyke Film Career

Continuing the tradition of his family, Carey entered the film industry and began his acting career in 1994 by featuring in Diagnosis Murder, a series in which his father and grandfather had also starred. During his time on the show, Carey played seven distinct roles.

After his debut, he acted as Doug in Clueless and Billy in Diagnosis Murder: Town Without Pity. He has also appeared in several other productions, such as JAG, ER, 6 Guns, Titanic II, and A Soldier’s Love Story. Carey’s most recent acting role was in a video titled A Haunting in Salem, released in 2011.

Carey doesn’t write books, but she is unquestionably a scriptwriter. As previously noted, he co-wrote the film Don’t Worry Darling script with his brother Shayne.

Additionally, he contributed to the television shows Diagnosis Murder, The Sacred, Chernobyl Diaries, The Silence, Into the Dark, and others as a writer and scriptwriter. Dyke also works as a film producer.

Carey And Shayne Van Dyke Co-Scripted Movie

Don’t Worry Darling, a horror film released on September 3, 2022, generally received positive reviews from critics. The film was first announced in 2019.

The film’s original story was written by the Dyke brothers, Carey and Shayne, whose spec script was included in the 2019 Black List, which lists the most well-liked unproduced motion picture screenplays.

Afterward, the project included scriptwriter Katie Silberman, a producer and a screenwriter. His revised story became the movie’s screenplay, and production began.

Carey Van Dyke Is Married To Stephanie Rhodes Van Dyke

An ex-actor who is now 46 and married. According to his Facebook profile, he married Stephanie on September 3, 2019.

Although they have only been married for a few years, the couple had a longer-lasting connection before getting hitched. They started dating in 2010, and throughout that period, they frequently shared how much they loved one another on their social media accounts.

Right now, Carey and his wife are successfully managing their marriage.

Both the husband and wife were previously married to other partners before becoming acquainted. While Dyke was married to Stephanie, the identity of her ex-husband is unknown. Anne Coolbaug was Dyke’s first wife.

Carey Van Dyke Kids

He has three children named Ava, Gracie, and Jane Van Dyke from his marriage to his former wife, Anne.

Ava, his first daughter, will turn 21 in 2023 because she was born on July 26, 2001. He frequently expresses his love for his older child on Instagram. Father Dyke uploaded a picture of her with the message, “On my daughter’s 18th birthday.”

And on December 8, 2003, Gracy, his second kid, was born. The 19-year-old daughter of Carey is still in the rehabilitation stage and utilizes a wheelchair to get about.

She was stricken with meningitis as a toddler. Carey and his now-wife take care of her. Jane, Dyke’s youngest daughter, becomes 15 in 2023 as well. She entered high school this year after being born on May 8, 2007.

In addition to his biological children, he is the father of Alex and Mia, the children from a previous marriage to his ex-wife. He adopted them following his marriage to his ex-wife.

Carey Vna Dyke Net Worth
